services.heading: Featured Profile
services.detail: Rank your profile at the top to make you stand out in a crowd of jobseekers
benefits: Your profile is upfront when recruiters search candidate like you
You are showcased as an active job seeker who is keenly looking
Increase your chances of getting shortlisted in an interview

services.heading: Resume Writing
services.detail: Get professionally written resume which helps you get your dream job
benefits: Clearly Stated Objective Targeting the job you're looking for
Work History in the right chronological order
Highlight your education background and key skills
Use of Keywords in a way that Aplication Tracker ranks you
A Cover letter that helps you get to the interview stage
